Package com.intellij.openapi.components

Class StoragePathMacros

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.components.StoragePathMacros

  • public final class StoragePathMacros
extends java.lang.Object
    We have a framework for persisting component states (see State Storage). It allows to specify which file should hold persisting data. There is a number of standard file system anchors like 'workspace file', 'project config dir' which can be used for defining a storage file's path. Hence, IJ provides special support for such anchors in the form of macros, i.e. special markers that are mapped to the current file system environment at runtime.

    This class holds those markers and utility method for working with them.

      • WORKSPACE_FILE

        public static final java.lang.String WORKSPACE_FILE
        Workspace file key. 'Workspace file' holds settings that are local to a particular environment and should not be shared with another team members.

      • CACHE_FILE

        public static final java.lang.String CACHE_FILE
        Storage file for cache-like data. Stored outside of project directory (if project level component) and outside of application configuration directory (if application level component).
